website_summaries.verdict: Keen Home's fixes have vastly improved the Smart Vents. That said, they still won't really impress until the automation also gets a big upgrade.
pros: Keen Home's Smart Vents boast a great base design, and the app follows suit
cons: Vent-to-hub connection still isn't perfect, and automation needs more development

customer_reviews.title: Stay away! Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Total waste of money. Vents do not stay connected at all. I have four in our home. Sometimes the scheduling works, sometimes it does not. We have to check every vent every evening to see if they are actually responding. Two of our vents are exactly equal distance from the hub and do not work consistently. Once a week we have to reconnect all of our vents. Constantly told that they are working on the issues. Nothing is ever resolved. We have dealt with this nightmare for a year.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Greenamyer

customer_reviews.title: They paired easily with Smarthings
customer_reviews.text: Got 2 of them in today. They paired easily with Smarthings, and are controlled easily by same. Have them in some routines already. One in daughter's room to stop her room from cooling while at school, and 1 in my bedroom. We have to vents there and was going to use the second one in their also, allowing me to stop cooling the Master bedroom for the majority of the day. I suspect I'll get these paid off in +- 6 months from a reduced power bill. Also, I got them on time in a professional box.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great, but needs modification.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 6 of these. They work great! Design is great aside from 1 simple flaw. The metal frame is double-sided taped to the housing. It took about 24 hours to come apart. Simple fix, 4 rivets.
customer_reviews.author: Djs8130495

customer_reviews.title: Died after 15 months
customer_reviews.text: It worked well for 15 months, but the batteries were running low so I swap the batteries, unit never came back. Swapped the batteries again, no life. Seems to have died after 15 months of use and a single battery set. There's seemingly no way to contact Keen's support. So beware of your $120 investment only lasting a year or so depending on your usage. Update 01/21/2020: Got in contact with Keen, there is an email address at the bottom of their page for generic contact. In short, "Sorry, nothing we can do, it's been over a year" so....I guess I'll go look at Flair Smart Vents.
customer_reviews.author: Matt B

customer_reviews.title: Great service!
customer_reviews.text: Well, the order wasn’t perfect. However, that is the true measure of a company; how they handle a mistake. They did better than awesome. I recommend them highly.
customer_reviews.author: Clay W. Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Troublesome connection, leaky and no response to support request.
customer_reviews.text: Very troublesome connectivity. Once connected, do not stay connected, even with Smart Bridge extension. Totally unresponsive technical support. I even got an apology from a higher up after complaining about lack of support and still never got a response to the support issue. Some units do not have tight louvers, so they leak. Returned one because it would not connect, but no response or refund so far.
customer_reviews.author: brandy2808

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Received probably a returned one / used which did not work - had to return it back
customer_reviews.author: esalomo

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Worked as advertised. I didn't know I had to buy a hub as well.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Good product, great price, quicker delivery would be great
customer_reviews.text: Good price, would be 5 stars except for slow delivery (almost 2 weeks). The product itself does the job, even though I did have to reset all the vents post it's install (as a bridge extender). Keen has a really good product, just needs better documentation explaining how it all works, figuring out is alot of trial and error. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Awesome first version of software, needs more integration with other thermostats other than Nest.
customer_reviews.text: It's great but I wish they would hurry up and integrate the Ecobee since it has individual thermostats for each room. I wish I could give it a range of temperature and it would adjust based on the current temperature in the room.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Dearing

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, Sets Up in Minutes
customer_reviews.text: Painless setup and paired with my new Smart Vents almost immediately. Apparently one can also pair the aforementioned with a SmartThings hub, but I didn't have much luck there (nor have I been able to get ST to identify the vents after paired with the Keen Bridge). Bridge is required for "Works with Nest," though it also seems they can only be paired with one hub (SmartThings, Keen Bridge, etc.) so there may be a trade-off, but I digress... The Keen Bridge works as advertised and took very little time and energy to get my smart vent system up and running. Highly recommended for the home automation enthusiast.
customer_reviews.author: Chad B.

customer_reviews.title: Kinda works....sometimes
customer_reviews.text: Terrible support, terrible connectivity over zigbee. Terrible hub and terrible mobile apps. However, if you hook up some 3rd party software integration to SmartThings and if you can over come the terribly unreliably connectivity, then it can work.....sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Works great with SmartThings. A little noisy but not too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick L

customer_reviews.title: Smart Vents helped me balance the airflow in my home
customer_reviews.text: Recently installed these in by 4 bedroom, three story home. I was suffering from 3-4 degree temperature differentials in certain rooms and I've noticed an immediate difference after installing Smart Vents. I should note that I purchased an extra bridge to act as a signal amplifier since two of my Smart Vents are installed on a different floor than my router. Installation and setup was fairly painless. I did need to chat with Keen's customer service briefly to clarify a few of the app's features. They actually pointed me to a useful blog post here: [...] At any rate, I am happy with my purchase and look forward to future improvements to the app--especially Ecobee integration!
customer_reviews.author: NH

customer_reviews.title: unusable
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't get it to work consistently. Gave up on it and reverted to smart things hub
customer_reviews.author: RGrantSmith

customer_reviews.title: They just don't work that well.
customer_reviews.text: Can't get the smart hub and it's a brick without it. The vent looks well made, but since I can't use it, it's a 1. Update: Got the hub. Vents constantly loose connection with hubs. If they worked I'd love them but they just don't.
customer_reviews.author: DGD

customer_reviews.title: Bought 3, returning 3 Need their "Smart Hub". ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3, returning 3 Need their "Smart Hub". It is not made clear that you need to give them additional money for the hub. Why can't I control wth the app? Big Fail and money grab. Going back
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Clemmer

customer_reviews.title: Made in China dogs!t
customer_reviews.text: After spending$700 in fall' of '17, I thought that my uneven heating/cooling issues would be behind me. Got bridge and vents to function after quite some time. Vent here working one day, not working the next. Vent there, working one day, not working the next. Giant pain in the a$$ Today, I disconnected the whole system. Out of 10 vents, 3 still worked (motor wise, others burned out along the 3 years). Now bridge disappeared, again. Nothing helps. NO OTHER DEVICE IN MY HOME LOSES WI-FI, JUST THIS CRAP.
customer_reviews.author: vcorde

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 18 months.
customer_reviews.text: Just stopped powering up. Wouldn't recommend this as a long-term solution.
customer_reviews.author: K. McCubbin

customer_reviews.title: Just Doesn’t Cut It in the Long Run
customer_reviews.text: Nice idea in theory but just doesn’t work in the long run. There is always something going wrong. Reminds me of an old Volkswagen I used to have. You can’t get by for very long without tinkering with it. Disconnections, restarting server, finicky battery connection, distance issues (even in a very small house) etc. I gave them a try for a couple years and am finally just going to toss them in the garbage. Another bleeding edge product tried, but ended up in a pool of blood.
customer_reviews.author: The Virtual One

customer_reviews.title: They oversell what the vents can do. You essentially ...
customer_reviews.text: They oversell what the vents can do. You essentially have 6 hour time slots that you can open or close the vents which is really not ideal if you're trying to set tight temp schedules. The vents are constantly disconnecting and the app cannot keep a connection with my ecobee3 thermostat and constantly has to sign back in. Last straw is the app continually crashes.
customer_reviews.author: M_A_DataAnalyst

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time/money
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to install the system to help fix a problem we’re the south side of my house gets a lot hotter than the north side. I installed everything in this “smart” bridge would not connect to anything. I spent 10 days trying to get customer service to help me. They sent a few messages asking me to try all different things. I tried everything they recommended and it still wouldn’t work. I have a dozen devices connected to my Wi-Fi system and I’ve never had an issue connecting anything. It is clearly they’re smart bridge. Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Fitch

customer_reviews.title: Best smart home device I’ve seen.
customer_reviews.text: Simply put, if you install this system correctly it will work correctly. It took me a couple hours to figure out how to design this equipment into my current HVAC system and now I have zone control where I need it. The HVAC company wanted over 3k to outfit my basement as a separate zone but this system has done it for about $500 and I have 3 separate zones. So far I’m very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: crfitch

customer_reviews.title: Keen Home is not ready for the market
customer_reviews.text: 1. If you want to be able to use your phone to open/close vents, congratulations, this *mostly* works. 2. If you want smart vents to integrate into a system to AUTOMATICALLY open/close to keep all rooms at desired temperatures, look elsewhere. 3. I already had to build my own hub because the keen home hub / app would not work. 4. Two of the vents stopped working and it's been 9 months of back and forth with their support with no resolution. I replaced all the vents in my house with KeenHome vents and I regret every bit of it; it's not been useful at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ev

customer_reviews.title: One of my worst purchases of the year!
customer_reviews.text: It's really a terrific idea but the company has no customer support. The unit that I purchased is still under warranty and has stopped working. You can only reach the company by email and they seem to respond only days after your inquiry, if at all. Flair has a competitive product and perhaps they stand behind their product better, certainly couldn't be worse!
customer_reviews.author: SteveB

customer_reviews.title: ZigBee Range SUCKS !
customer_reviews.text: The concept is great - i have used my Samsung SmartThing with the Keen Vent and had issues from time to time to control the vents - well must be the SmartThings - right ? So i got the Keen Hub and now i can't control 2 of my vents at all - the range is terrible - VERY LIMITED. Half of my house is Z Wave - Zigbee is only here for the Keen Vents - WHY not WIFI or Z WAVE ?? those work way better ...
customer_reviews.author: Marc Strzodka

customer_reviews.title: Be aware of false claims of working with Nest
customer_reviews.text: Beware of false advertising that these units work with Nest. They do not integrate at all and when I support they said it wasn’t their fault and blamed it on Google. You won’t realize this until you have them installed and connected to the app of course. They did say I could return the with a restocking fee 🤷🏻‍♂️. Like others have said, it’s a great concept that was poorly designed. As of last week one of my vents just opens and closes every five seconds for no apparent reason.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bridge stopped working and they want me to buy a new one
customer_reviews.text: It's been working ok for a while now (slow response in vent opening changes, but it's just a vent so it doesn't need to be lightning quick in the changes I suppose), but all of a sudden the ethernet port on the bridge stopped working. Support is completely useless in troubleshooting the device, and they eventually just give up and tell me to just buy a new one!! I'd rather put money into a product where the company supports their products. I will never buy a keen product again, and cannot recommend anyone buy this on account of their long term support.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan

customer_reviews.title: Does not work. No phone support.  So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have 5 ... endless connectivity issues, when the do actually work the vents vibrate and make a noise. A few simply fell out of my ceiling. I have them all sitting in a box In the garage for last few months. Anyone want to make and offer to take them away ?
customer_reviews.author: Neil DillinghamTop Contributor: Smart Home

customer_reviews.title: Product is great, until it's not. Support is absolutely terrible. You'll be frustrated if you buy.
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 of these and was very pleased until two of them started having a problem. Customer support is absolutely terrible. They would not respond to the questions I asked. All I got were pre-written responses that were not even close to addressing my problem. I suspect that support is outsourced to another country and their english is too poor to understand service requests. I asked for the issue to be escalated to a supervisor and I haven't heard back from them since. I wouldn't buy these, at least until the company changes their customer service support provider.
customer_reviews.author: bostonuser

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The Keen smart products, vents, bridge and sensors are okay products but the batteries run down quickly and the bridge just stops working for no reason and the company has ZERO support! The won't talk to you. The take days to respond to emails, if they do at all and they have a chat which takes days to get any response from. I have a defective bridge and I cannot get anyone to address it other than to just send me a paper to try to fix it. HORRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE
customer_reviews.author: Mark Frees

customer_reviews.title: Good concept, but just doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted these to work--our owner's bedroom is just too hot in the summer and cold in the winter--but the vents lose connections all the time and burn through batteries about every other month. Tried them on the Keen hub and with Samsung Smartthings using multiple relays to try to keep good connectivity, no luck. Will look for something else.
customer_reviews.author: M.A.Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Junk product. No customer service. Worthless 30 day warranty.
customer_reviews.text: I bought ten of these. They worked for a few months. Now they don't... None of them. Even when they did work, I needed to manually open and close through the app, so I could have saved a bunch of money just walking over to the vent and opening or closing (which is what I have to do now after only a few months anyway).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You better trash your money thru windows..
customer_reviews.text: These vents are totally trash, they keep disconnecting and needs resetting every single day, sometimes 3 times a day, totally design fault, these things shouldnt be on the market at all, needs a lot of works, 6vents, 6sensors, 1 bridge returned all..
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great smart device and a very reasonable price!
customer_reviews.text: I just installed 4 units and a smart bridge this morning. The installation was very simple almost too simple to be true. I've tried all of the controls and everything I tried worked perfectly. Room set up and scheduling was very easy to program which was a relief since I'm not very tech savvy. Aesthetically the vents are gorgeous and fit well in any decor. Love the elegance they add to each room and the sense of accomplishment knowing we're lowering our energy costs as well. Bravo Keen!!!
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Great solution
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 of these off another site much cheaper than here but they have solved my problem with a warmer room, I'd recommend them fully for places where the vents are out of the way or on the wall or ceiling because the vent cover does stick up a bit more than regular floor vents.
customer_reviews.author: bearcat

customer_reviews.title: Great idea....horrible implementation! Save your money....
customer_reviews.text: These guys have had ample time to fix their product and it is still far from even operational. It flat out does not work. You are better off walking in and manually closing the vent. Setup isn’t bad....it just isn’t going to work once you have it setup. Ive had them for about a year with ecobee sensors for every room and they might work 1 or 2 days a month combined.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup, works perfect
customer_reviews.text: this is a great unit. powered everything up, connected my 2 vents to the bridge (I did my research first) and now it's all working beautifully. took me maybe 10 minutes total? I look forward to the long term benefits of this device. I am even going to order 2 more 6x10 vents.
customer_reviews.author: deerock

customer_reviews.title: Keen Support Team does not help.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two registers and a temperature sensor. I contacted Keen Support since early July since the temperature sensor is not communicating with the registers. They kept sending the same troubleshooting available in their app. To date the registers are useless.
customer_reviews.author: jagjr

customer_reviews.title: Great hardware, horrible app support (Android)
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my vents and hub directly from Keen. The app has not been updated in about a year. Integration with ecobee would be great if the app didn't lose the authentication nearly daily (Keen blames Ecobee) I want to like this product, but it feels like the product is dead
customer_reviews.author: Mike S

customer_reviews.title: Stay away
customer_reviews.text: This company went downhill fast after they got bought out, after a year some of my vents stopped working and the none existing support recommend I buy a new one, wtf, i offers to send it back for repair and I was told they only have 30 day support now. I already had to buy a replacement repeater because I was tired of arguing with them
customer_reviews.author: ronmax11

customer_reviews.title: The Smart home gadget
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases for a Smart home! High quality, low maintenance, and immediate results. I urge you to try a few out and see for yourself the impact on your home efficiency.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smart Bridge Locked Out
customer_reviews.text: Locked myself out of old account so I have been unable to use this smart bridge any more. Customer support needs to de-register the smart bridge so I can can connect to a new account, but they have not responded In 3 days. Hopefully don’t have a paper weight and can get it reset.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: Good concept idea. But not funcional. For the past two years I spent more money in batteries then in gas for my car. Also, they eventually break. And the customer service plays dumb with you. Don’t buy it. Try the competidor.
customer_reviews.author: Leo Botelho

customer_reviews.title: Good looks, lacks function
customer_reviews.text: As for looks and attention to premium quality appearance, these are impressive, from the packaging to the overall looks and thought. HOWEVER the actual functionality lacks as the temp sensors built in are useless since they are heavily impacted by the airflow temperature. More importantly there is an annoying noise when air flowing through between 20%-100% opening, a rattle that woke us in the middle of the night followed by the cover falling off (magnet held.) Another issue is that they don't really fit flush, there is a bit of a gap against your ceiling. Watch video for rattle
customer_reviews.author: jefo13

customer_reviews.title: Not designed by A/C Techs.
customer_reviews.text: I work in the A/C market, this is a very poor design, that obviously did not have the input of a technician. This does not make your system efficient, in fact it creates a thing called static pressure which puts a strain on your system. A proper zoning system should be installed at your Plenum where the air flow enters the ductwork, not at the end of the duct. This is not a “smart” product at all.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Installed and had to uninstall for my client - AVOID
customer_reviews.text: This product is full of connectivity issues. I put a system in for a customer and one literally fell apart, crashing to the floor and scaring the homeowner. The units have bad radios and don't reliably stay online. I replaced with a different brand and haven't had a callback.
customer_reviews.author: HVACDUDE

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: It was a little confusing to set up but once it’s up ,it’s seamless and works perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Bob Arlotta

customer_reviews.title: Well engineering controllable vent
customer_reviews.text: This is a controllable vent. It's not a thermostat or a controller or an automation device. I installed a bunch of them today and so far they are working as expected. I'm not giving them 1 star because I can't figure them out or because they don't work with my existing thermostat​. These are very sophisticated controllable vents. They aren't any more or any less.
customer_reviews.author: Bart

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Great idea but they are more bother than they are worth. I had replace the bridge once and had to reset the units sevrral time. Now i can get it back on line to communicate and tech help is no help. Dont waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my smart home design
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the smart bridge and 3 vents. The installation was a snap and the units work great. I can't wait to realize the savings. In the mean time, we are very happy with our purchase. Besides the installation being easy the units are designed beautifully and look very sturdy. Very good addition to my smart home mindset.
customer_reviews.author: Dan medina

customer_reviews.title: No connection at all
customer_reviews.text: My Keen vents never even connected to the bridge. Called customer service and was given the same procedure for reset that I had tried several times. I now have non working vents. I hope another company can come out with a working system
customer_reviews.author: david call

customer_reviews.title: Bad idea
customer_reviews.text: Closing vents throws off balance of HVAC system, creating back pressure.
customer_reviews.author: mark sebby

customer_reviews.title: Waste of $1000
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 20 smart vents and when Iris by Lowe's stopped supporting it's been a nightmare to find a suitable hub. And keen make it impossible to call for support. Waste of $1000.
customer_reviews.author: John L.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money and time
customer_reviews.text: Totally worthless. Will NOT connect to your Keen Smart Vents via Android. I've tried several times and the 'searching spinner' just spins and spins without finding anything. I've tried factory resetting the vent and following all their instructions. Simply does not work. Save your money, and if you have to have one of their Smart Vents, get a Smart Things hub instead. You'll be missing some key Nest features, but at least you'll be able to control the vents. For me, I'll be waiting for Ecovent.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great product and innovative company!
customer_reviews.text: Really innovative product and great customer service. I have 4 vents and they paired easily with my Smarthings app. I look forward to seeing my power bill go down and these will be paid off in no time! I hope Keen produces more products like this.
customer_reviews.author: JI9

customer_reviews.title: Top 5 WORST purchase
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money!! It's really a stretch to say they work as advertised. Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Easy, simple, Install and great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I installed my smart bridge next to my router which is behind my side and it's been working perfectly. Installation was easy and pain free which was great since I'm not a techie kind of person.
customer_reviews.author: Dan medina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with product and customer service, will be ordering more
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Selby

customer_reviews.title: Home Automation and Zoned Cooling/Heating Solutions
customer_reviews.text: Hi, I'm a SmartThings developer and I created many smartapps to orchestrate any ST connected thermostat, temp/motion sensors and smart Vents (such as the Keen Home smart Vents) in order to direct more airflow to the occupied rooms which are hotter/colder in your house. Do a google search on Zoned heating/cooling solutions for SmartThings Yves Racine Ecomatiqhomes.com [...] Regards.
customer_reviews.author: Yves Racine

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly! I thought my husband was crazy ordering 8 of these for rooms we dont use much and for our bonus area that is always too hot or cold depending on if the heat or ac is running. Enjoying the comfort and efficiency these things provide!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

product_meta.title: Keen Home Smart Vent - 4"x12"
product_meta.description:
Size Name:4x12 Inch Smart Vent

We believe your home should be your sanctuary and not another source of stress. Our products ensure that when you get home, your home gets you. The Smart Vent was designed to increase comfort and reduce energy costs by regulating your home’s temperature room-by-room.



FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 


Meet your Smart Vent Now you can heat and cool your home the intelligent and efficient way—room by room. The Smart Vent creates an intuitive room-zoned system that proactively balances your home’s temperature. The average sized home only needs a system of 4 - 8 Smart Vents to ehance both comfort and efficiency.

Intelligently connected The Smart Vent retrofits existing floor, wall, and ceiling air vents in just a few simple steps, then wirelessly connects to your home network. The vents communicate with each other, as a Smart Vent System, to regulate airflow in rooms too hot, too cold or not in use for most of the day.


Temperature Sensor calculates individual room temperature to better regulate airflow


Pressure Sensor measures air pressure at the vent for system protection and diagnostics


Battery Advanced control algorithms enhance battery life, extending it for years



More comfort, more efficiency Strategically placing 4 - 8 Smart Vents throughout your home, in rooms that are over-conditioned or rarely used, creates a balanced home temperature system that enhances comfort room by room.The Smart Vent’s built-in temperature and pressure sensors wirelessly communicate with each other—as well as other smart devices—to regulate and redirect airflow when needed.

About the Startup 
Describe your product in 3 words.

Room-by-room. Intelligent. Zoning.

Where did you get the inspiration for your product?

Nayeem, Ryan, and Will all grew up in homes with central air. They all suffered from the typical hot and cold spots that many homeowners deal with on a daily basis. In early 2013, Ryan was lying in his bed, with hot air pouring on him from the air vent above his head. He thought how much more comfortable he’d be if he could control the airflow from his phone, which was lying on his bedside table. Ryan brought the idea to Nayeem and Will and all three began running experiments in their homes that winter. They observed that selectively closing certain vents enhanced both comfort and efficiency of a home’s central HVAC system. The Smart Vent was born.

What differentiates your product from similar products out there?

Currently, there are no truly intelligent air vents on the market. Our product installs in a few minutes and a system of just 4-8 Smart Vents can achieve much of the benefits of a multi-thousand dollar professionally-installed damper system. Moreover, our Smart Vents are wirelessly connected and can work together to make the smartest decisions for your home’s airflow. Finally, the Keen Home app gives users the ability to take control of their airflow and also gain insight into the health of their HVAC system.

Tell us about the best and most challenging parts of the creation process.

Building a connected device presents many of the challenges that software companies face and combines them with the difficulties of hardware manufacturing. Thankfully, we have built an excellent team that has a wealth of hardware and software development experience. The entire team is motivated every day by the fact that at Keen Home, we’re building products that will truly enhance the way people live in their homes. With our technology, we want your home to take care of you—not the other way around.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 2.3 out of 5 stars100 ratings2.3 out of 5 stars
